<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101247</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Acoustic Droplet Ejection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Akustisches Tröpfchen-Ausstoßen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éjection Acoustique de Gouttelette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ejeção Acústica Da Gota</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Espulsione Acustica Della Gocciolina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακουστική εκτίναξη σταγονίδιων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Eyección Acústica De la Gotita</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This animation explains how sound is used to move small volumes of liquid with high precision and accuracy.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Animation erklärt, wie Ton benutzt wird, um
kleine Datenträger Flüssigkeit mit hoher Präzision und Genauigkeit 
zu verschieben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette animation explique comment le bruit est 
employé pour déplacer de petits volumes de liquide avec la 
précision élevée et l'exactitude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este animation explica como o som é usado mover 
volumes pequenos do líquido com precisão elevada e exatidão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa animazione spiega come il suono è usato 
per spostare i piccoli volumi di liquido con alta precisione ed 
esattezza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η ζωτικότητα εξηγεί πώς ο ήχος χρησιμοποιείται 
για να κινήσει τις μικρές εντάσεις του ήχου του υγρού με την 
υψηλή ακρίβεια και την ακρίβεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta animación explica cómo el sonido se utiliza
para mover volúmenes pequeños de líquido con la alta precisión y 
la exactitud.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
